snippet: Before a coming three-game trip, the Nets held an open practice at Fort Hamilton in Brooklyn, and learned some history about the borough they now call home.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets hold an open practice on Veterans Day at the United States Army Garrison Fort Hamilton, Brooklyn, for a few dozen uniformed troops and military personnel, and learn some history about the borough they now call home.
lead_paragraph: Before a coming three-game trip, the Nets held an open practice at Fort Hamilton in Brooklyn, and learned some history about the borough they now call home.

headline.print_headline: On Holiday, a Local Lesson for the Nets
